data.lyric:
[ti:Everyday]
[ar:Logic/Marshmello]
[al:Bobby Tarantino II]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Everyday - Logic/Marshmello (棉花糖)
[00:04.38]Producer：Marshmello
[00:08.77]Yeah ayy
[00:11.01]I work hard every motherf**kin' day ay ay ayy
[00:16.44]I work hard I work hard every day ay ay ayy yeah
[00:24.33]But today is my day it's my day
[00:27.70]
[00:28.44]And no matter what they say it's my day
[00:32.92]
[00:33.98]La la la la la la yeah yeah
[00:38.77]Roll up to the spot feelin' real good
[00:41.12]Think you gon' talk sh*t you better not my homies real hood
[00:44.67]They say Logic why you do that I don't know I don't know
[00:47.62]Yeah they used to be like Who that I don't know I don't know
[00:50.87]Now they know my name wherever I go
[00:54.04]Used to think that's what I wanted but now just don't know
[00:56.99]No I can't f**k with that nook if you buckin' back
[00:59.50]Yeah I been workin' but I ain't get nothin' back
[01:00.97]Tell me the dealy now hold up wait really now
[01:02.51]All of that sh*t you been talkin' just silly now
[01:03.65]Just as quick as you rise
[01:05.46]
[01:06.29]Just as quick as you could fall
[01:08.62]
[01:09.14]Oh no no no I can't f**k with that at all
[01:11.53]
[01:12.61]Can't f**k with that at all
[01:14.27]
[01:15.01]I work hard every motherf**kin' day ay ay ayy
[01:19.53]
[01:20.41]I work hard I work hard every day ay ay ayy yeah
[01:28.58]But today is my day it's my day
[01:31.82]
[01:32.37]And no matter what they say it's my day
[01:36.92]
[01:37.91]La la la la la la yeah
[01:42.67]All all she ever wanted was attention
[01:46.54]
[01:47.25]And a bunch of other sh*t I shouldn't mention
[01:50.31]'Cause she got daddy issues for days for days and days
[01:55.09]But today she ain't got sh*t to do
[01:59.05]
[02:00.14]Her right along with you
[02:02.48]
[02:03.16]So we gon' f**k around and vibe and vibe and vibe and vibe
[02:07.52]I'm tryna live my life but am I doing it right
[02:12.56]Hey I'm tryna live my life but am I doing it right
[02:18.31]
[02:19.19]'Cause they tell me I'm the man
[02:20.83]You the man right now you the man right now
[02:22.77]With the whole wide world in the palm of your hand right now
[02:25.11]F**k the lights and the cameras and the money and the fame
[02:26.61]I'ma do it for the fam right now
[02:28.40]I'ma get it for the 301
[02:29.50]And the R A double T P A C 'cause you know
[02:31.68]I work hard every motherf**kin' day ay ay ayy
[02:36.41]
[02:37.27]I work hard I work hard every day ay ay ayy yeah
[02:45.21]But today is my day it's my day
[02:48.60]
[02:49.19]And no matter what they say it's my day
[02:53.69]
[02:54.71]La la la la la la yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Everyday]
[ar:Logic/Marshmello]
[al:Bobby Tarantino II]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.38]//
[00:08.77]//
[00:11.01]我每天工作都异常努力
[00:16.44]我每天工作都异常努力
[00:24.33]今天就是我出头的日子了
[00:27.70]
[00:28.44]不管别人怎么说 今天就是属于我的
[00:32.92]
[00:33.98]//
[00:38.77]把自己的感觉提升到极限
[00:41.12]我觉得你最好别说那些胡话了 我的哥们都是真的恶棍
[00:44.67]他们问我为何那样做 我不知道 我真的不知道
[00:47.62]没错 以前没人认识我 我不知道 我真的不知道
[00:50.87]而现在我走到哪儿都有人认得我
[00:54.04]曾经我以为自己想要的不过就是名利罢了 现在我真不知道自己到底想要什么
[00:56.99]你若还钱我就不会和那娘娘腔调情了
[00:59.50]没错 我一直都在努力工作 可我什么也没得到
[01:00.97]告诉我到底还要等多久
[01:02.51]你每次总是说再等等 再等等
[01:03.65]就和你名声大振一样快
[01:05.46]
[01:06.29]就和你跌落低谷一样快
[01:08.62]
[01:09.14]不 我不能再等了
[01:11.53]
[01:12.61]我不能再等了
[01:14.27]
[01:15.01]我每天工作都异常努力
[01:19.53]
[01:20.41]我每天工作都异常努力
[01:28.58]今天就是我出头的日子了
[01:31.82]
[01:32.37]不管别人怎么说 今天就是属于我的
[01:36.92]
[01:37.91]//
[01:42.67]她所做的一切只为吸引住我的目光
[01:46.54]
[01:47.25]我就不该提其它的一些事
[01:50.31]因为她爸压根儿就不同意我们的事
[01:55.09]而现如今她活得很好
[01:59.05]
[02:00.14]她正和你在一起
[02:02.48]
[02:03.16]所以我们四处晃悠 嗨起来 嗨起来 嗨起来 嗨起来
[02:07.52]我要努力好起来 而且是以一种正确的方式
[02:12.56]我要努力好起来 而且是以一种正确的方式
[02:18.31]
[02:19.19]因为他们说我是男子汉
[02:20.83]你就是男子汉 顶天立地的男子汉
[02:22.77]现在你可以只手遮天
[02:25.11]去他的明星光环
[02:26.61]从现在起我要为了自己而奋斗
[02:28.40]我要为家乡马里兰而奋斗
[02:29.50]还要为我的好哥们Ratt Pack而奋斗 因为你知道
[02:31.68]我每天工作都异常努力
[02:36.41]
[02:37.27]我每天工作都异常努力
[02:45.21]今天就是我出头的日子了
[02:48.60]
[02:49.19]不管别人怎么说 今天就是属于我的
[02:53.69]
